function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close physical interaction with live plants in home gardening may facilitate the transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among residents.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene measures and regular cleaning of gardening equipment to minimize the risk of disease transmission.","Technologies":"Hygienic gardening tools and equipment, personal protective equipment (PPE).","People":"Residents, especially those with compromised immune systems.","Owner":"Residents, local health authorities, gardening equipment manufacturers."},{"Description":"Increased physical interaction with outdoor spaces such as balconies may contribute to the spread of airborne diseases.","Impact":"Potential transmission of airborne diseases within residential communities.","Mitigation":"Promote ventilation and air purification systems to reduce the concentration of airborne pathogens. Implement guidelines for safe use of outdoor spaces.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, natural ventilation systems, guidelines for safe outdoor interaction.","People":"Residential community members, especially those living in close proximity to each other.","Owner":"Property owners, residential community associations, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of climatic conditions in balcony design may lead to indoor environmental conditions that are conducive to disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor air contamination and temperature-related health issues.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough environmental impact assessments and implement appropriate design measures to ensure proper ventilation and thermal comfort. Educate residents on the safe use of designed outdoor spaces.","Technologies":"Smart climate control systems, environmental impact assessment tools, educational resources on safe outdoor interaction.","People":"Architects, designers, property owners, and residents.","Owner":"Architects, property developers, local authorities."}]}
